00034 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FCDPhysicsShape : public FCDObject
00035 {
00036 private:
00037     DeclareObjectType(FCDObject);
00038 
00039     bool hollow;
00040     FUObjectPtr<FCDPhysicsMaterial> physicsMaterial;
00041     bool ownsPhysicsMaterial;
00042     
00043     //one of these two will define the rigid body
00044     FUObjectPtr<FCDGeometryInstance> geometry;
00045     FUObjectRef<FCDPhysicsAnalyticalGeometry> analGeom;
00046     bool ownsGeometryInstance;
00047 
00048     float* mass;
00049     float* density;
00050     FCDTransformContainer transforms;
00051     FCDEntityInstance* instanceMaterialRef;
00052 
00053 public:
00054     FCDPhysicsShape(FCDocument* document);
00055     virtual ~FCDPhysicsShape();
00056 
00057     // Physics parameters
00058     float GetMass();
00059     void SetMass(float _mass);
00060     float GetDensity();
00061     void SetDensity(float _density);
00062     bool IsHollow() const {return hollow;}
00063     void SetHollow(bool _hollow) {hollow = _hollow;}
00064 
00065     // Geometry
00066     bool IsAnalyticalGeometry() const { return analGeom != NULL; }
00067     FCDPhysicsAnalyticalGeometry* GetAnalyticalGeometry() { return analGeom; }
00068     const FCDPhysicsAnalyticalGeometry* GetAnalyticalGeometry() const { return analGeom; }
00069     bool IsGeometryInstance() { return geometry != NULL; }
00070     FCDGeometryInstance* GetGeometryInstance() { return geometry; }
00071     const FCDGeometryInstance* GetGeometryInstance() const { return geometry; }
00072     FCDGeometryInstance* CreateGeometryInstance(FCDGeometry* geom, bool createConvexMesh=false);
00073     FCDPhysicsAnalyticalGeometry* CreateAnalyticalGeometry(FCDPhysicsAnalyticalGeometry::GeomType type);
00074 
00075     // Geometry Transforms
00076     FCDTransformContainer& GetTransforms() {return transforms;}
00077     const FCDTransformContainer& GetTransforms() const {return transforms;}
00078     FCDTransform* AddTransform(FCDTransform::Type type, size_t index = (size_t)-1);
00079 
00080     // Physics Material
00081     FCDPhysicsMaterial* GetPhysicsMaterial() {return physicsMaterial;}
00082     const FCDPhysicsMaterial* GetPhysicsMaterial() const {return physicsMaterial;}
00083     void SetPhysicsMaterial(FCDPhysicsMaterial* physicsMaterial);
00084     FCDPhysicsMaterial* AddOwnPhysicsMaterial();
00085 
00086     // Create a copy of this shape
00087     FCDPhysicsShape* Clone(FCDPhysicsShape* clone = NULL) const;
00088 
00089     // Read in the <physics_shape> node of the COLLADA document
00090     virtual bool LoadFromXML(xmlNode* node);
00091 
00092     // Write out the <physics_shape> node to the COLLADA XML tree
00093     virtual xmlNode* WriteToXML(xmlNode* parentNode) const;
00094 };
